Question
========

A certain brand of granola puts one surprise in each box. There are four possible surprises and each box has an equal chance of containing each surprise to contain. What is the probability of getting two different surprises if you buy two boxes?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/4
* 2/4
* 3/4
* 1/16

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/4: Incorrect
* 2/4: Incorrect
* 3/4: Correct
* 1/16: Incorrect
